about_the_game:
Howdy, partners!

Let me introduce you to Ananas. Ananas - Pineapple Idle Game is our first of “Play to earn” game series. It is a relaxing clicker game in which you click a pineapple (or more conveniently hold key or even use the Lazy button) to get in-game money to buy upgrades or to play minigames (one is available at the moment, others will be added). Whenever you reach certain amount of in-game money, you're offered prestiging, which will enhance your future progress.

You'll get random pineapples over the course of playing to grow your collection, trade with friends, sell to strangers or use to attend random picks!

Ananases (pineapples) drops vary in rarity and their count is limited. No worries, drops are based on player’s gaming activity, not your in-game results ;-)

And the best thing? We’ll be picking random values and for such random values we’ll be buying your items from Steam marketplace! Frequency of such events is based on gamers activity on Steam market. To ensure transparency, these events will be happening live on Developer broadcasts and Twitch streams. Chances and values are totally random, which means that there’s same chance percentage of developer buying item for an equivalent of 0.03$, 2.000$ or any value in between! Feel free to play to get -or even stock up- because the stock is limited. Soon we’ll even add support to exchange common ananases into random lottonases too!

The game Ananas is and will always remain Free to play!

Support Ananas and get your Supporter perks, or play it for free!

Features:

  • Drops

  • Ananas Companion app (behaving as launcher) making sure you get your drops on time

  • Coded by human (AI just gave us some graphics and songs for launch)

  • Pineapples, who would have say? =P

  • Achievements

  • Redeemable codes (try "ananas")

  • Compact 1024x768 resolution to fit any display

  • Prestige system, upgrades and minigame, save system to keep progress

  • Discord server for votes or anything that players have on their mind

Coming:

  • Ananas Companion will be updated with ability to exchange lower quality pineapples for higher quality ones and to pack/unpack items into/from bundles

  • Picks of random values for which higher quality items will be bought from gamers on live streams (starting December 2024 or January 2025, depending on Marketplace activities/Supporters)

  • More items

  • Discord community competitions with rewards (starting Q1 2025)

  • In-game music player

  • More minigames

  • Applicable skins

  • Whenever we surpass Steam popularity milestones, Steam Trading cards and Steam Badges will be added to level up and decorate your Steam profile

Made in Czech Republic

name: Ananas - Pineapple Idle Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Ananas is free Play-to-earn relaxing clicker game where you're gonna get pineapples to trade! Dropped/bought items has their use and have a fair chance to get bought for random value by dev on upcoming live streams, that's where Ananas differs!
